thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Animation Characters To Place Bonds In Aggregate Principal Amount Of Up To HK$100 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Animation Characters To Place Bonds In Aggregate Principal Amount Of Up To HK$100 Mln

organizations.name: reuters) - china animation characters company ltd

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - China Animation Characters Company Ltd :
* TO PLACE BONDS IN AN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF UP TO HK$100 MILLION
* NET PROCEEDS FROM PLACING ESTIMATED TO BE ABOUT HK$97.4 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
